name: Running Sheep Free (itch)
description:
As long long ago, the cursed sheep wants to running away. Let's stop them together!

This app can test reaction capacity of players, you can find cute and various sheep every new adventure.Meanwhile, the players can have

experience of sheep's amazing speed and funny expressions.

When you don't crush them down, they will be angry, rampageous, be careful!

Instructions:
Tap the screen,make the pillar down , get sheep crushed.
